iana.template_text:
(last updated 2011-09-06)

MIME media type name : Application

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.dece.zip

Required parameters : none

Optional parameters : none

Encoding considerations : binary

Security considerations : The security issues associated with this 
   type have not been assessed.

Interoperability considerations :

Published specification : DECE "Device Specification"; DECE "Common 
   File Format and Media Formats Specification"; www.uvvu.com

Applications which use this media : DECE encoders, decoders, DRM and 
   distribution systems.

Additional information :

   1. Magic number(s) : none
   2. File extension(s) : .uvz .uvvz
   3. Macintosh file type code : UVVZ
   4. Object Identifiers: none

Additional contact: admin&decellc.com

Person to contact for further information :

   1. Name : Michael A Dolan
   2. Email : md.iana&newtbt.com

Intended usage : Common

   Exchange of archives of CFF files (see video/vnd.dece.mp4).

Author/Change controller : DECE Technical Working Group (TWG) &
   Management Committee (MC)

(file created 2011-09-06)
